channel.title: CVE Feed for ValvePress -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ValvePress -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-4849|2024-05-18T05:40:01.841Z -- ValvePress -- WordPress Automatic Plugin
item.description: The WordPress Automatic Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘autoplay’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 3.94.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-32693|2024-04-22T07:58:25.163Z -- ValvePress -- Automatic
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ValvePress Automatic.This issue affects Automatic: from n/a before 3.93.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-27956|2024-04-29T08:55:21.997Z -- ValvePress -- Automatic
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in ValvePress Automatic allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Automatic: from n/a through 3.92.0.
